response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards and offers unparalleled value in its category. We believe it's worth far more than its face value, but we're willing to discuss pricing. Considering its quality and the benefits it provides, I propose an offer of $12,000 for this product. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can come to an agreement that benefits both of us.", "product_price": 12000}
